content: pattern number l50149 a granny square is made first for corner of afghan work then proceeds back and forth in row across only 2 sides of the square 48 x 48 / 122cm x 122cm lion brand hometown usa 81yrds/74m 5oz/142g 135­099 los angeles tan a - 1 ball 135­136 portsmouth pumpkin b - 1 ball 135­159 madison mustard c - 2 balls 135­176 galveston green d - 3 balls 135­175 montpelier peacock e - 4 balls 135­148 portland wine f - 5 balls crochet hook size n-13 9mm gauge three 3­double_crochet groups = 5½ / 14 cm
